thread.title_full: BMW recalls 2.30 lakh vehicles of 3 series, 5-series, X5 in US to replace faulty Takata airbags : Recalls, News - India Today

title: BMW recalls 2.30 lakh vehicles of 3 series, 5-series, X5 in US to replace faulty Takata airbags : Recalls, News - India Today
text:
BMW recalls 2.30 lakh vehicles of 3 series, 5-series, X5 in US to replace faulty Takata airbags AP | February 3, 2017 | Posted by Pratik Rakshit | UPDATED 19:21 IST 
BMW is recalling more than 230,000 cars and SUVs in the US to replace potentially dangerous Takata air bag inflators. 
Dealers will replace the inflators if they're made by Takata. The recall is expected to start on March 15. For more news from India Today, follow us on Twitter @indiatoday and on Facebook at facebook.com/IndiaToday For news and videos in Hindi, go to AajTak.in . ताज़ातरीन ख़बरों और वीडियो के लिए आजतक.इन पर आएं.
